Welcome! I'm a sixth-year PhD candidate in Economics at [CEMFI](https://www.cemfi.es/index.asp). 

I work in the area of applied microeconomics. My fields of research are **development economics** and **political economy**. In my job market paper, I document that an anti-corruption policy in Brazil induces a brain drain out of public sector careers.

You can find my [CV](https://yangxun96.github.io/cv/CV_YangXun.pdf) here.
